name: Serena Ngaio Simmons
bio: Born and raised in O‘ahu, Hawai‘i, and of Māori and Pākehā descent, Serena Ngaio Simmons studies at the University of Hawai‘i at Mānoa. Her writing has appeared in the Hawai‘i Review, Literary Hub, Blackmail Press, and elsewhere. Simmons is a former member of the 2011 and 2012 Youth Speaks Hawai‘i slam poetry team.
